titleStmt.title: A letter of November 12 from General Monck directed (& delivered) to the Lord Mayor, Aldermen, and Common Council of the city of London, inciting them and all true English-men, to give their assistance, for redemption of the almost lost liberties of England.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

titleStmt.title: A letter of November 12 from General Monck directed (& delivered) to the Lord Mayor, Aldermen, and Common Council of the city of London, inciting them and all true English-men, to give their assistance, for redemption of the almost lost liberties of England.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to the Duke of Albemarle, George Monk. cf. NUC pre-1956.
